The former Smolian deputy has been recognized as an agent in the RF
The Ministry of Justice of Russia has included the ex-deputate of the Smole region Duma of Vladislav Zivitz in the register of foreign agents.
19.01.2024 22:43
There's going to be a complete driver check in Smallsk again.
DPS officers continue to fight drunk driving.
19.01.2024 22:20
Over the past year, more than 300 drivers were again drunk driving
The police reported on the consequences of the accidents that the drunken drivers were doing.
19.01.2024 21:45
In Smolenska, a teenager stole and dumped other people's purchases.
Apparently, he didn't like the extraction from the package. The exception was a beer glass the guy decided to keep. There was good evidence for the investigation.
19.01.2024 20:29
Moles will benefit from changes in credit legislation since 2024
In January 2024, the legislation governing loans and loans entered into force. This is what we spoke to Andrei Ignatkovy, the manager of the regional branch of the Bank of Russia.
19.01.2024 19:47
Denis Mantourov assessed the quality of industrial products of the Smole region
The Vice-President of the Government of the Russian Federation, the Minister of Industry and Trade, Denis Mantourov, visited the work field of the Smolen region. In conjunction with Governor Vasili Anohin, the vice-premier introduced the work of the industrial enterprises of the region...
19.01.2024 19:11
In Smole province, a second case of poaching in a week was identified
This time, the remains of an illegal wild animal were in a dive near the village in Rudnan district.
19.01.2024 18:35
The Slovenians invite to the Russian Federation 2024
On 10 February, the Smole region will participate in the regional phase of the All-Russian ski race of Russia. For the first time this year, pleases can register for the event through the Gosu-service.
